AREZ_DEPENDENCIES - Static variable in class arez.Flags
Flag set set if the application code can not invoke Observer.reportStale() or ComputableValue.reportPossiblyChanged() to indicate dependency has changed and the observer.
AREZ_OR_EXTERNAL_DEPENDENCIES - Static variable in class arez.Flags
Flag set if the application code can invoke Observer.reportStale() or ComputableValue.reportPossiblyChanged() to indicate non-arez dependency has changed.
AREZ_OR_NO_DEPENDENCIES - Static variable in class arez.Flags
Flag set set if the application code can not invoke Observer.reportStale() or ComputableValue.reportPossiblyChanged() to indicate dependency has changed.

Verifiable - Interface in arez.component
Interface implemented by components that can verify their internal state.
verify() - Method in interface arez.component.Verifiable
verify the state of the component and raise an exception if any state fails to verify.
verify(Object) - Static method in interface arez.component.Verifiable
Verify they supplied object if it is verifiable.
VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED - Static variable in class arez.Flags
The flag can be passed to actions to force the action to verify that an action performed an activity that required an action.

W

willPropagateSpyEvents() - Method in interface arez.spy.Spy
Return true if spy events will be propagated.
wrap(Collection<T>) - Static method in class arez.component.CollectionsUtil
Wrap specified parameter with unmodifiable variant if and only if Arez.areCollectionsPropertiesUnmodifiable() returns true, otherwise return the supplied list.
wrap(Set<T>) - Static method in class arez.component.CollectionsUtil
Wrap specified parameter with unmodifiable set if and only if Arez.areCollectionsPropertiesUnmodifiable() returns true, otherwise return the supplied set.
wrap(Map<K, V>) - Static method in class arez.component.CollectionsUtil
Wrap specified parameter with unmodifiable map if and only if Arez.areCollectionsPropertiesUnmodifiable() returns true, otherwise return the supplied map.
wrap(List<T>) - Static method in class arez.component.CollectionsUtil
Wrap specified list with unmodifiable list if and only if Arez.areCollectionsPropertiesUnmodifiable() returns true, otherwise return the supplied list.
